paragraph: The Prime receives a notice that Cornelius is to meet him .

He then recollects Cornelius 's earlier meetings with him : his first meeting with Fudge soon after he became the Prime , Sirius 's escape from Azkaban , the  , the Triwizard and the  Azkaban mass breakout .

When Cornelius finally arrives , he reveals a number of incidents which had occurred in the Muggle world and for which the Prime is forced to owe responsibility : the collapse of the Brockdale Bridge , a supposed hurricane in the West , the deaths of Amelia Bones and Emmeline Vance and the insanity of Junior Minister Herbert Chorley which have all been caused by Tom , his followers the Death Eaters and their Giant allies .
In short , the Second Wizarding War has begun .
Fudge also reveals that he has been sacked and replaced by Rufus as Minister for Magic .
Scrimgeour too meets the Prime and discusses security arrangements with him .
He also reveals that Cornelius will be a laison between them . Narcissa and her sister Bellatrix visit Severus at Spinner 's End , a poverty-stricken neighbourhood in a northern mill town .

Narcissa wants Severus to help her protect her son Draco , who has been made a Death and has been assigned a mission by Tom himself . Bellatrix advises against this , distrusting Severus for not taking part in the Battle of the Department of Mysteries at the Ministry of Magic , and for his many suspicious actions through the years which make her doubt whether Severus is actually on their side . Severus explains his behaviour : He was at Hogwarts when Tom fell to be a spy for him , he did n't seek him out for the same reason her brother in law and the other deserters did n't look for him , he stopped Tom from getting the Philosopher 's Stone because he thought Quirinus wanted it for himself , he never tried to kill Harry because Albus would know about it , and he did n't take part in the Battle of the Department of Mysteries because Tom ordered him to stay at Hogwarts . Severus also tells Narcissa that he knows about Draco 's mission . Bellatrix tells her sister she should be proud but Narcissa believes that Tom is sending him on a suicide mission as punishment for her husband 's failure . Severus offers to help Draco . Narcissa asks him to make an Unbreakable Vow and he agrees . With Bellatrix as their Bonder , Narcissa asks Severus to agree to the following terms :
Severus agrees to all three terms and the vow is made .
Albus comes to visit Harry at  Privet to take him to The Burrow , where he would spend the rest of his summer holidays .

Albus reads Sirius 's will : Harry inherits his deceased godfather 's wealth , the Black family house at  Grimmauld Place , which Harry lets the Order of the Phoenix continue to use as headquarters , and the House-elf Kreacher , whom Harry sends to work at the Hogwarts kitchens . Albus then chastises Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley for Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's neglect and mistreatment of Harry but asks that Vernon be allowed to return to Privet one final time , and Vernon and Harry depart .
Harry notices Albus has received a serious injury to his right hand , but the Headmaster dismisses it as unimportant .
Albus then asks Harry 's help in convincing an old Hogwarts teacher , Horace , to come out of retirement .
They pay him a visit , but Slughorn is reluctant to return to the school , fearing it may put his life in danger from Death .

Harry tells him that no teachers have died since Albus became Headmaster , except Quirinus , who was working for Tom . This dubious comfort , and the opportunity to get Harry to join his Slug Club , persuades Slughorn to return to Hogwarts . Albus then drops Harry off at The Burrow , praising him for the way he has handled his godfather 's untimely death and reveals that he would take private classes for him in the forthcoming academic year . Harry is warmly received at The Burrow by Lestrange-Fred-Peverell-Angelina-Percy-Ronald-Riddle-Fleur-Weasley-Malfoy-George-Roberts-Molly-Potter-Charles-Dursley-Arthur-William , who offer him Fred and George 's bedroom to sleep in .
Harry meets his best friends Ronald and Hermione and Ronald 's younger sister Ginevra the following morning .

He also meets Triwizard , who is now working at Gringotts and is engaged to Ronald 's oldest brother William , which is not liked by Hermione , Ginevra , and the rest of the Weasley -LRB- except Ronald -RRB- .
Later in the day , the trio receive their O.W.L. results ; Harry and Ronald receive  O.W.L.s while Hermione receives  .

However , Harry is slightly disappointed as he has only achieved ` Exceeds Expectations ' in Potions , meaning he can no longer realise his ambition as an Auror as Severus only takes students who have achieved ` Outstanding ' into his N.E.W.T. Potions class .
After spending the next few weeks at The Burrow , Harry and Hermione go with the Weasley to Diagon to get school supplies .
Rubeus is entrusted with providing security to the group .

After a fight with Draco and his mother at Mary 's , the entire group go to Weasley ' Wizard Wheezes , Fred and George 's successful joke shop . Harry insists on paying for the merchandise , but Fred and George refuse George 's money as George was the one who gave them the money to start the joke shop , and Ginevra buys a Pygmy Puff as a pet . While still in the store , Harry , Ronald , and Hermione spot Malfoy walking through Diagon without George 's mother and follow George under the Invisibility cloak to Knockturn and see George enter Borgin and Burkes , a shop that sells dark artefacts . The trio wait outside , listening to Draco by Extendable Ears and watching George through a window .

They hear Malfoy talking with the owner Borgin , about repairing an object and keeping another object safe . Malfoy also shows Borgin something which Harry suspects is the Dark Mark -LRB- a mark branded on the left forearm of each Death -RRB- , and threatens Borgin by referring to the werewolf Fenrir .

Harry comes to the conclusion that Malfoy has become a Death and is up to no good , a theory which is dismissed by Ronald and Hermione . On the Hogwarts , Harry meets his other friends Neville and Luna and shares a compartment with them , as Ronald and Hermione are in the Prefect .

By now , Harry finds himself attracted to Ginevra , although she appears to have long given up on her crush on him and is currently dating Harry 's classmate Dean . Harry and Neville are invited for lunch to Slughorn 's compartment on the train along with Ginevra and some other students with connections to well known or influential people . Before reaching Hogsmeade station , Harry enters Malfoy 's compartment using his Invisibility cloak to prove his suspicions about Malfoy . His suspicions are proved correct : Malfoy tells his friends Vincent , Gregory , Pansy and Blaise Zabini that he has become a Death and he may not return to Hogwarts for his final year if the mission he was assigned by Tom is successful . Unfortunately for Harry , Malfoy notices Harry spying on him and once his friends have alighted from the train , he paralyses Harry , breaks his nose , covers him with the Invisibility Cloak and leaves him on the train .
Nymphadora , who is assigned by the Ministry of Magic to guard Hogsmeade , comes to Harry 's rescue .
She takes him to the school , where he is received by Severus .

At the Start-of-Term Feast , Albus announces , to Harry 's shock , that Severus is taking over the post of Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher , while Slughorn will be taking Severus 's vacated job as Severus .
This allows Harry and Ronald to continue with Potions , as Slughorn takes students who have received ` Exceeds Expectations ' in their Potions O.W.L.
Harry and Ronald take up Charms , Defence Against the Dark Arts , Herbology , Potions and Transfiguration as their N.E.W.T. subjects .

During the first Defence Against the Arts class of the year , Harry receives a detention from Severus as he had talked back to him following Severus trying to use him as a guinea pig to show how a nonverbal spell works .
Later that day , they attend Potions , where Harry and Ronald receive old copies of Advanced Potion Making from Slughorn as they did not buy the book .
Harry 's book , previously owned by someone named The Half-Blood Prince , contains a large number of shortcuts on making various potions , which prove useful in brewing the Draught of Living Death .
To everyone 's surprise , Harry 's potion is adjudged the best by Slughorn and is awarded a bottle of Felix Felicis as a prize .

When Harry tells Ronald and Hermione about the book , Ginevra overhears them and angrily confronts Harry about following the directions of this mysterious book in fear that it may be cursed like Tom 's diary .
A jealous Hermione then tries various spells to reveal the true nature of the book , but the book proves to be a normal one , allaying Ginevra and Hermione 's fears .
As promised at The Burrow , Albus begins the private series of lessons with Harry concerning Tom .
In the first lesson , Dumbledore shows Harry the first of a number of memories he has collected concerning Tom 's past using The Pensieve .

It shows a former Head of the Magical Law Enforcement Patrol , Bob Ogden visiting a man named Marvolo in order to summon his son Morfin to a Ministry hearing in connection with an attack on a Muggle named Tom .
A huge commotion occurs : Morfin attacks Ogden , with Marvolo stoutly defending his son 's actions .

Marvolo also tries to attack his daughter Merope after finding out that she has a crush on Riddle . After viewing this memory , Albus tells Harry that both Marvolo and Morfin were sentenced to six months and three years imprisonment respectively in Azkaban due to their behaviour to Ogden and other Ministry officials .
He also reveals that Merope was Tom 's mother and Riddle was his father , thus making Marvolo 's maternal grandfather and Morfin his maternal uncle .

He then speculates that following Marvolo and Morfin 's arrest , Merope may have offered a Love to Riddle , as a result of which they fell in love and got married . Later , when Merope was pregnant , she may have stopped giving the potion to Riddle , which may have led to Riddle , who had no love for Merope , leaving her and returning to his village .
Harry , the new Gryffindor , holds trials to select the team for the annual Quidditch .
Due to Harry 's popularity , it proves to be extremely taxing and difficult , with even first-years , Ravenclaws and Hufflepuffs turning up for the trials .

In the end , Harry selects a team which includes among others , seventh-year Katie , the only member remaining from the Quidditch team Harry joined in his first year , Ginevra , who returned as a chaser , and Ronald , who returned to his position as Keeper , staving off competition from another seventh-year and Slug Club member Cormac McLaggen .
Later Harry , Ronald and Hermione go visit Rubeus , who is upset at them as they had dropped his subject , Care of Magical Creatures .
After lying to Rubeus that they had dropped Care of Magical Creatures as they could not fit it into their timetables , Rubeus reconciles with them .

When the trio return to the Great for dinner , Harry finds out that Hermione had used the Confundus Charm on McLaggen so that Ronald would become Keeper , but he does not tell Ronald this . Slughorn then invites Harry and Hermione for dinner with the other Slug Club members in his office , which Harry declines as he has to do his detention with Snape .
Harry finds a couple of spells scribbled on the Half-Blood Prince 's textbook .
He tries one of them -LRB- Levicorpus -RRB- in his dormitory , but points his wand at Ronald by mistake , as a result of which Ronald hangs by his ankle from the ceiling .

Later that day , Harry , Ronald and Hermione go to Hogsmeade , where they witness Katie being cursed after touching a strange necklace . Remembering seeing the same necklace in Borgin 's shop , Harry voices his suspicions of Malfoy to Minerva , but she , like Ronald and Hermione , rubbishes his theory , stating that Malfoy did not go to Hogsmeade as he had a detention with her , and that there is no proof that he bought the necklace . In his second lesson with Albus , Harry first sees Caractacus Burke talking about a locket of Salazar 's that a pregnant and desperate Merope had sold him , Riddle having abandoned her when she stopped giving him Love , then goes into a memory of Albus 's to the orphanage that Riddle had grown up in . Harry learns that Merope had later died in childbirth , and that even at an early age , Riddle had developed his powers , which he used to punish people who annoyed him and had a sadistic , cruel and independent nature , just like the adult Tom .
Albus also reveals to Harry that Tom likes to collect trophies .
During a Herbology lesson , Ronald expresses his jealousy of not being invited to Slughorn 's upcoming Christmas party , to the point of teasing Hermione about it .
When she tells him that she was planning to invite him , however , his attitude changes , and they begin to show signs of attraction to each other .
Harry is unsure how he feels about this , remembering his unsuccessful relationship with Cho during his fifth year .
With Katie unable to play , Harry recruits Dean onto the Quidditch team , which continues to improve .
On their way back from practise however , Harry and Ronald come across Dean and Ginevra kissing behind a tapestry .

Harry feels a huge surge of jealousy toward Dean , while Ronald and Ginevra have a heated argument . Ronald states that he does n't want to see his sister `` snogging '' -LRB- kissing -RRB- people in public , while Ginevra tells him that her love life is none of his business , and that he 's only upset because he 's never kissed anyone , referencing Harry and Cho 's relationship and revealing that Hermione had once kissed Viktor . This piece of information wrecks Ronald 's relationship with Hermione , as well as Ronald 's Quidditch skills , and badly alters Ronald 's personality . Harry meanwhile tries to convince Ronald that Ronald 's feelings for Ginevra are entirely elder brotherly , but eventually realises that Ronald has fallen in love with her.To improve Ronald 's Quidditch and mend Ronald 's friendship with Hermione , Harry pretends to slip Ronald some Felix Felicis on the day of the match between Gryffindor and Slytherin . Feeling lucky , Ronald goes on to save everything the Slytherin chasers throw at Ronald , and Gryffindor hammers Slytherin .
However , the plan backfires .

After the match , Ronald accuses Hermione of not having faith in Ronald 's Quidditch abilities , because she thought Ronald really had taken lucky potion , and starts going out with Lavender to spite her .
As Slughorn 's Christmas party approaches , Hermione warns Harry that a number of girls , particularly Romilda Vane , plan to slip him a love potion , to get him to invite them .
Harry gets round this by going to the party with Luna , while Hermione goes with Cormac McLaggen to get back at Ronald -LRB- which she regrets very much later -RRB- .

During the party , Malfoy is dragged in , in trouble for lurking in a certain deserted corridor and claiming to be gatecrashing ; Slughorn lets him off the hook . Severus , however , takes Malfoy out of the party and into a deserted classroom . Harry follows them both and overhears Severus offering to help Malfoy with his mission , which Malfoy flatly refuses , accusing Severus of trying to interfere and steal his glory .

During the Christmas holidays at the Burrow , Harry tells Ronald , his father Arthur and Remus what he overheard , but they believe that Severus was trying to find out Malfoy 's plan so he could tell Albus . Later , Rufus visits the Burrow , and requests that Harry appear to work alongside the Ministry , to boost the morale of the public .
Harry turns it down , knowing that the Ministry is arresting and imprisoning innocent people and remembering how they persecuted him last year .

On their return to Hogwarts , Harry notices Ginevra is not enthusiastic about meeting Dean , and tells Hermione about what he heard between Malfoy and Severus , but she also believes Severus was working on Albus 's orders .

When Harry mentions Fenrir , a werewolf Remus had told him about during the holidays and the werewolf that bit him , she recalls Malfoy threatening Borgin with him , and Harry states that this proves Malfoy 's a Death Eater .
Hermione , however , got past this one , saying that it might have been `` an empty threat . ''

In his third lesson with Albus , Harry learns that during his time at Hogwarts , Tom had gathered Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley . He first investigated his father , and later assumed the name Tom upon discovering his father was a Muggle and never attended Hogwarts . Albus and Harry then go into Morfin Gaunt 's memory , where he reveals to his nephew , Tom how he was conceived .

After hearing this , Tom went on to murder his Muggle ancestors , taking revenge on them for abandoning him , eliminating the last of the `` unworthy '' Riddle line , stealing Morfin 's father 's ring and implanted false memories into Morfin , framing him for the murders .

In the next memory , Tom asks Slughorn about Horcruxes , which results in Slughorn yelling that he knows nothing about them . Albus is confident that the memory has been tampered with , however , noting patches of grey fog that came up when Slughorn was shouting , and asks Harry to retrieve the true memory . Realising Harry is on to him after a botched attempt from Harry to get the memory , Slughorn starts avoiding him , and Harry instead chooses to focus on investigating Malfoy , using the Marauder 's Map , noticing that Malfoy disappears off it at certain times .
Harry is still doing the apparation lessons and has no luck of apparating .

March has arrived and on Ronald 's seventeenth birthday Ronald consumes a number of Chocolate Cauldrons containing a Love -LRB- courtesy of Romilda and intended for Harry -RRB- . Harry takes Ronald down to Slughorn for an antidote , and the three of them decide to have some of Rosmerta 's Mulled Mead , originally meant for Albus . However , Ronald drinks it and discovers -LRB- too late , of course -RRB- that it is poisoned . Thankfully , Harry manages to save Ronald with a Bezoar .
Ronald reconciles with Hermione and Ginevra .
Some time afterwards , Rubeus tells Harry that he overheard Albus and Severus arguing , and Cormac McLaggen confronts Harry to ensure he can play in Ronald 's place in the upcoming Quidditch match .
Harry also finds out that Ronald has been avoiding Lavender .
Later , at the Quidditch match , with Luna commentating , McLaggen grabs a beater 's bat to show the beater how to hit the bludgers , and accidentally cracks Harry 's skull .
Finally , in the hospital wing , Harry summons Kreacher and Dobby and orders them to tail Malfoy .
In their fourth lesson , Albus is disappointed that Harry failed to obtain Slughorn 's true memory .

Dumbledore shows him two memories : one of Tom being shown Salazar 's Locket and Helga Hufflepuff 's Cup by a wealthy woman named Hepzibah Smith -LRB- he later stole both artefacts -RRB- , the other of Riddle applying for the Defence Against the Dark Arts teaching post at Hogwarts , which Albus rejects as he felt that it was an attempt by Riddle to further search the school for secrets and recruit followers . This post was thenceforth jinxed by Riddle ; teachers never held the post for more than a year , suffering some terrible fate or humiliation which caused them to leave the position .
Ronald wants to break up with Lavender but does n't know now .

Harry learns from Kreacher and Dobby that Malfoy is regularly visiting the Room of Requirement -LRB- which does n't appear on the Marauder 's Map -RRB- , and spends the next few days trying to get inside .
Not knowing what Malfoy is using it for , he has no success .
Ronald and Hermione come back from the Hogsmeade test , in which Hermione is successful but not Ronald , who will take the exam with Harry again .

Harry again fails to convince Slughorn to share his true memory , and Ronald suggests he use the Felix Felicis . Harry takes the Felix Felicis and goes down to Rubeus 's hut because Aragog died and Rubeus wanted Harry to go to the burial . On the way to Rubeus 's hut , Harry luckily meets Professor Slughorn on the way and goes with Harry to Rubeus 's because Rubeus wants to collect Aragog 's venom -LRB- Acromantula venom is very rare and expensive -RRB- . Aragog is buried and the adults get drunk , so Harry has a good opportunity to get the memory . As a result of the Felix Felicis , Harry is able to get the memory with ease .
It turns out that in reality , Slughorn told Riddle everything he wanted to know about Horcruxes , how they were objects that a person can conceal a part of his or her soul in .
This explains how Tom was able to survive his rebounding killing curse .

Albus believed that Tom made six Horcruxes : his diary -LRB- which Harry destroyed four years earlier -RRB- , the Gaunt 's Ring -LRB- which Albus destroyed the previous year , greatly injuring his hand in the process -RRB- , the locket , the cup , an object pertaining to Rowena Ravenclaw 's and the snake Nagini .
Harry learns the next day that Ginevra and Dean have split up .
He is unwilling to ask her out though , fearing Ronald 's reaction .
Meanwhile , a recovered Katie has returned to the school , and Harry asks who gave her the necklace .
She states that someone Imperiused her in the girl 's bathroom at Rosmerta 's Pub in Hogsmeade .

Shortly before the final Quidditch match of the year , Harry finds Malfoy crying over how his mission is failing . When he sees Harry , he attacks him . During the ensuing duel , Harry uses a spell written in The Half Blood Prince 's book , which badly injures Malfoy . Severus witnesses the event , heals Malfoy , and gives Harry a large number of detentions that cause him to miss the match .
Upon returning to the Gryffindor common room after his first detention , he discovers that the team had won the Quidditch in his absence , and Ginevra runs up and hugs him .
At this point , Harry finally reveals his feelings for Ginevra and kisses her .
Both of them are ecstatic and start dating .
Some time later , Albus asks Harry to come to his office .
On the way , he runs into his old Divination teacher Sybill , who was trying to hide sherry bottles in the Room of Requirement before being thrown out .

She tells Harry that she heard a male voice -LRB- which Harry suspects to be Malfoy 's -RRB- whooping before she was ejected , and also reveals that Severus had told Tom about the prophecy concerning him and Harry , which caused him to murder Harry 's parents .

Harry expresses outrage that Albus later gave Severus a job at Hogwarts , but Albus states that Severus felt great remorse for what he had done . He then asks Harry to join him in finding a Horcrux , Slytherin 's locket , which Harry agrees to .
Before leaving , Harry tells Ronald and Hermione that Malfoy 's almost certainly going to try something tonight , and gives them the remainder of the Felix Felicis .
Albus and Harry travel to a cave in which Tom had tormented two children in his youth .
They proceed through the cave , coming to an island in the middle of a lake .

On the island , they find a basin of emerald green potion , with the locket at the bottom . On Albus 's orders , Harry reluctantly force-feeds him the potion , which badly weakens him and causes extreme thirst . In an attempt to save him , Harry gives him water from the lake , awakening dozens of Inferi Voldemort had placed to guard his Horcrux .

Harry attempts to fight , but there are too many of them . Just as he is about to be overwhelmed , Albus creates a ring of fire around them , which fends off the Inferius , and allows them to escape with the locket to Hogsmeade , where they discover the Dark Mark above the astronomy tower at Hogwarts .
Borrowing broomsticks , the pair fly to the tower .
Upon hearing someone approaching them , Albus uses a charm to paralyse Harry and hides him under his invisibility cloak , before being disarmed by Malfoy .
Malfoy reveals that he had let Death into the school through a pair of vanishing cabinets , which were the objects Harry had overheard him questioning Borgin about .
Malfoy also explains that he was behind the cursed necklace and poisoned mead incidents , which were really assassination attempts on Albus .

Albus reveals that he had known Malfoy was attempting to kill him , but allowed him to remain at Hogwarts because he knew that Tom would have murdered Malfoy once his cover had been blown . Albus tries to persuade him to change sides , but the other Death Eaters join the scene and urge Malfoy to finish his mission . Then Snape appears , and with Malfoy still reluctant to finish off the unarmed Albus , Severus kills Albus . Released from the spell after Albus 's death , Harry pursues Severus through battle in the halls of the school and out onto the grounds . Near the entrance to Hogwarts , Harry attempts to curse Severus , who repels his attacks with ease and reminds the other Death Eaters they are not to harm the boy .
When Harry tries one of the Half-Blood Prince 's spells , an enraged Snape reveals that the spell is his own .
He is the Half-Blood Prince , having taken the title when he was a student as a pun on his mother 's maiden name .
-LRB- Hermione 's research later reveals that Severus 's father was a Muggle named Tobias Snape and his mother a pureblood witch named Eileen Prince . -RRB-
Buckbeak the Hippogriff attacks Severus , who leaves Harry behind and escapes with Draco .

When he returns to Albus 's body , Harry finds that the locket was a fake : the real horcrux was already stolen by someone with the initials R.A.B. After the battle , Ginevra accompanies Harry to the hospital wing , where he learns that the only other person who died was a Death .

None of Harry 's friends are badly hurt , apart from William , the Weasley ' oldest child who was attacked by an untransformed Greyback , although the only side effects are permanent scars across his face and a liking for rare steaks . Fleur expresses her desire to marry William despite his potential transformations , and she and Mrs reconcile .
Nymphadora reveals her love for Remus , who had refused her because he was a werewolf and felt that she deserved someone young and whole , unlike himself .
Minerva questions Harry about what he and Albus were doing , but Harry , under orders from Albus not to tell anyone except Ronald and Hermione , refuses .
The teachers then discuss the future of Hogwarts , and plans for Albus 's funeral .

Harry turns his back on the Half-Blood Prince 's book , and regrets ever possessing it , although Hermione and Ronald comfort him , stating that while the Prince may have had a mean sense of humour , nothing in the book ever indicated that he was evil , or capable of murder .
The funeral is attended by many witches and wizards , including a number of minor characters in the series .

During the funeral , Harry ends his relationship with Ginevra to protect her from Tom . She reveals that she had never given up on him ; Hermione had advised her to go out with other people so she could relax around Harry , as previously she had trouble talking to him . As a result , he fell in love with her upon seeing who she really was , and regrets not asking her out sooner .
Harry then meets Scrimgeour , who again makes the offer he 'd made to Harry at Christmas , which Harry again turns down .
He then tells Ronald and Hermione of his intention to leave Hogwarts to destroy the Horcruxes and then Tom himself .
His two best friends agree to travel with him on his quest , and Harry happily acknowledges that there is `` still one last golden day of peace left to enjoy with Ronald and Hermione '' .
